DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate time course PF-00241939 concentration blood follow dose oral inhalation dry powder inhaler .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Estimate The Time Course Of PF-00241939 Concentration In The Blood Following Dosing By Oral Inhalation From Dry Powder Inhalers .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . A positive urine drug screen . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 14 drinks/week female 21 drinks/week male . Pregnant nursing female .
